Sentencas: Active three-phase boundaries (TPBs) significantly influence cathode performance in solid oxide fuel cells, but obtaining long TPBs and understanding the mechanism underlying the improved cathode performance when the electrolyte is prepared with a smooth surface by a high-temperature sintering process remain essential challenges.
Titulo: Relationship Between Designed Three-Dimensional YSZ Electrolyte Surface Area and Performance of Solution-Precursor Plasma-Sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathodes

Sentencas: In this work, we used flame spraying to deposit single-layer semimolten particles on a smooth electrolyte to build a three-dimensional surface with enlarged active surface area and thus increased TPBs.
Titulo: Relationship Between Designed Three-Dimensional YSZ Electrolyte Surface Area and Performance of Solution-Precursor Plasma-Sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathodes

Sentencas: Meanwhile, La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta (LSM) cathodes with fine microstructure were deposited by solution-precursor plasma spraying (SPPS) on the designed electrolyte to establish a three-dimensional cathode-electrolyte interface.
Titulo: Relationship Between Designed Three-Dimensional YSZ Electrolyte Surface Area and Performance of Solution-Precursor Plasma-Sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathodes

Sentencas: The deposition behavior of the semimolten particles on the smooth electrolyte and LSM cathodes on the three-dimensional electrolyte surface was studied.
Titulo: Relationship Between Designed Three-Dimensional YSZ Electrolyte Surface Area and Performance of Solution-Precursor Plasma-Sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathodes

Sentencas: The effects of the area enlargement factor (alpha (area)) on the polarization resistance of the SPPS LSM cathodes were investigated, using three-dimensional electrolytes with alpha (area) from 1.29 to 2.48.
Titulo: Relationship Between Designed Three-Dimensional YSZ Electrolyte Surface Area and Performance of Solution-Precursor Plasma-Sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathodes

Sentencas: The results indicated that convex particles with different molten states bonded well with the electrolytes.
Titulo: Relationship Between Designed Three-Dimensional YSZ Electrolyte Surface Area and Performance of Solution-Precursor Plasma-Sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathodes

Sentencas: SPPS LSM cathodes also showed good interfacial bonding with convex particles.
Titulo: Relationship Between Designed Three-Dimensional YSZ Electrolyte Surface Area and Performance of Solution-Precursor Plasma-Sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathodes

Sentencas: Finally, the cathode polarization (R (p)) decreased linearly with increase of alpha (area).
Titulo: Relationship Between Designed Three-Dimensional YSZ Electrolyte Surface Area and Performance of Solution-Precursor Plasma-Sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathodes

Sentencas: At 800 A degrees C, R (p) decreased from 0.98 to 0.32 Omega cm(2) when alpha (area) was increased from 1.29 to 2.48.
Titulo: Relationship Between Designed Three-Dimensional YSZ Electrolyte Surface Area and Performance of Solution-Precursor Plasma-Sprayed La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-δ Cathodes
